title: A Prince of Dust and Ashes
description: A Novella from his side. To be read AFTER Rose and Rotshade, Book 4 of The Dusk Wall Academy.Alone, and despised by the ones he loves, time is almost out for Sylas.Axoreth’s demise approaches, but before the end Sylas must find an answer to the question keeping him up at night.So tonight, while the others dance the evening away at a ball, Sylas braves a visit to his old tower. Determined to become what they need of him, he takes a journey with a demon to face the ugly truths of his past and seek out any light he still has to offer.The dark iron gates to the Dusk Wall Academy were as corroded and broken down as the pitiable crowd of sorry souls lined up before them.Sylas didn’t belong at a place like this.Yet, here he stood, at the front of that very crowd, waiting for the metal to creak open and admit him…
author: Marie Mackay
